title: New Update on League of Legends, but Does it Restart your Patch or Not?
body: I don't know if this New Update supposed to Restart your Patch or not. If it doesn't supposed to do that, Tell me how to fix it. Thanks for Reading this and Taking Your Time and Have a Nice Day!

replies.body: I want to help, but I'm not sure what you mean!  What's happening when you say restart?  Where and when is this happening? A screenshot could help too!
